results.content:
I am glad about reviewing this course because I also purchased the other CakePHP course from this author and I really think that he has made a great work on delivering this course.

The author's native language is probably not English and it is not fair that because of that his other courses got some not so positive comments while the material is totally worth it.

He's previous course really emphasize on the following Cake's conventions ( "convention over configuration" ) concepts.  This time we are going to build an actual app ;)

response.content: Thank you so much for the great review & feedback.
response.content_html: Thank you so much for the great review & feedback.

results.content_html:
I am glad about reviewing this course because I also purchased the other CakePHP course from this author and I really think that he has made a great work on delivering this course.

The author's native language is probably not English and it is not fair that because of that his other courses got some not so positive comments while the material is totally worth it.

He's previous course really emphasize on the following Cake's conventions ( "convention over configuration" ) concepts. This time we are going to build an actual app ;)

results.content: I would recommend anyone who want to learn web development from an expert to take this course. The instructor knows what he's doing.
results.content_html: I would recommend anyone who want to learn web development from an expert to take this course. The instructor knows what he's doing.

results.content: This is a beginner's course and it does a good job of introduction CakePHP basics.  I had worked with version 2 in the past and this brought me up to speed on the new version 4.  It was a little repetitive but for a beginner that may be a good thing.  I also had some issues with the volume level of the courses - some were low but I don't know if that is because of the videos or the udemy platform. Overall it is a good course for the price.
results.content_html: This is a beginner's course and it does a good job of introduction CakePHP basics. I had worked with version 2 in the past and this brought me up to speed on the new version 4. It was a little repetitive but for a beginner that may be a good thing. I also had some issues with the volume level of the courses - some were low but I don't know if that is because of the videos or the udemy platform. Overall it is a good course for the price.
